step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Try to keep your shoulders a little closer to your body as you begin the roll.
You're doing great! Focus on squeezing your shoulder blades together as you roll them down and back.
Nice completion of the first rep! Remember to breathe deeply when rolling your shoulders back.
Second rep starting well. Keep your shoulders relaxed and avoid shrugging them up towards your ears.
Excellent! Continue to focus on the circular motion, bringing the shoulder blades down and back.
Fantastic job finishing the exercise! You're improving shoulder mobility and lymphatic flow.

exercise_summary: Great job completing your shoulder rolls! Remember to gently squeeze your shoulder blades back and down in a smooth circle. Try to inhale as you roll back to help with breathing and oxygen flow.
